scripts.client-compile-js-bundle: browserify src/client/js/app.js -t stringify --extensions [.html] --debug | exorcist public/lib/js/app.js.map > public/lib/js/app.js
scripts.client-compile-js-uglify: uglifyjs public/lib/js/app.js -o public/lib/js/app.js --source-map public/lib/js/app.js.map -p relative --in-source-map public/lib/js/app.js.map
scripts.client-compile-js: npm run client-compile-js-bundle && npm run client-compile-js-uglify
scripts.client-compile: npm run client-compile-html && npm run client-compile-css && npm run client-compile-js
scripts.client-tests-watch: watch 'npm run client-tests' src/client/ test/client/suit/ test/client/mockups --interval 2
scripts.client-coverage-watch: watch 'npm run client-coverage' src/client/ test/client/suit/ test/client/mockups --interval 10
scripts.server-tests-watch: watch 'npm run server-tests' src/server/ test/server/suit/ test/server/mockups --interval 2
scripts.server-coverage-watch: watch 'npm run server-coverage' src/server/ test/server/suit/ test/server/mockups --interval 10
